title: The Weekend Wrap
abstract: If you are looking to make plans this weekend, here's our round up of things to do.
content:
If you are looking to make plans this weekend, here's our round up of things to do.

Friday, 8th June


To be held in Colombo for 02 days during Ramadan Festival Season, Colombo Night Bazaar will host a number of retailers offering a diverse variety of products to a dynamic community.


Join us for an evening of thought-provoking cinema. We are always welcome to suggestions for movies and intend them to be; insightful, family-friendly and visually pleasing. Film starts at 7pm!
Saturday, 9th June
The folks that brought you the ever popular Fairway Colombo Street Food Festival are back with a celebration of art and jazz. Bringing together a combination of talent that culminates into one giant explosion of arts and entertainment, with the sole purpose of promoting local art and jazz in the city of Colombo.


We’re inviting you to be part of our next Adoption Day! Join us on the 9th of June at No. 73, Jawatte Road, Colombo 5 from 10.30am-1.00pm.

Sunday, 10th June

Following an open photography call asking Sri Lankan photographers to submit their best shots on protecting our environment, climate change and motives that move us humans to interact responsibly with our environment, German multiple award winning photographer Andy Spyra and German-Sri Lankan conceptual photographer Liz Fernando selected a diverse group of talented photographers to be mentored by them on a 10-day travelling workshop.



We are back after a short break. Please bring love, good thoughts and come join us for an evening of letter writing.
And that's all from us this weekend. Have yourself a restful one.
